headline.main: MALTA GETS POUNDING BY GERMAN BOMBERS; British Force Withdrawal of Axis Libyan Unit Near Mekili

lead_paragraph: CAIRO, Egypt, March 2 -- Soon after daybreak yesterday Messerschmitts began sweeping over Malta, using small bombs and machine-guns to prepare the way for one of the heaviest air attacks that the Germans have yet made on the island, an attack that raged from noon until dark, the Royal Air Force command reported today.
abstract: German bombers pound Malta; Brit force Axis Libyan unit near Mekili to withdraw; Germans claim successful air activity, Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
